entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
